# canStepForward

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the item supports stepping forward.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var canStepForward: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Once the item becomes ready to play, the value of this property does not change. This behavior applies even when boundary conditions, such as when the item’s current time is equal to its end time, have been reached.

## Stepping through media

- **canStepBackward**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item supports stepping backward.
- **step(byCount:)**: Moves the player item’s current time forward or backward by a specified number of steps.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item supports stepping backward.
items.name: canStepBackward

items.description: Moves the player item’s current time forward or backward by a specified number of steps.
